column3:
Qhoterl Pasol has a passion for rations.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
Deliver the requested items to Qhoterl Pasol.

<If(Equal(IntegerParameter(4),16))><If(LessThan(IntegerParameter(1),IntegerParameter(2)))>Mine splendid scorpions at the Husk<Else/>Deliver the splendid scorpions to Qhoterl Pasol</If><Else/><If(Equal(IntegerParameter(4),17))><If(LessThan(IntegerParameter(1),IntegerParameter(2)))>Gather splendid wild berries at the Husk<Else/>Deliver the splendid wild berries to Qhoterl Pasol</If><Else/><If(Equal(IntegerParameter(4),18))><If(LessThan(IntegerParameter(1),IntegerParameter(2)))>Spearfish a splendid piranha in the depths of Lake Tusi Mek'ta<Else/>Deliver the splendid piranha to Qhoterl Pasol</If><Else/></If></If></If>.
Once we descend into the caverns, you'll appreciate that it isn't always practical to return to the surface to satisfy every bodily whim.
In light of this, I provide our workers with some rations to take with them, and I'd be grateful if you could assist me by obtaining an ingredient.
Scorpions are what I require─three ought to do nicely. You will find them if you search in the Husk.
Wild berries are what I require─three handfuls ought to do nicely. You will find them growing in the Husk.
A piranha is what I require─just one ought to do nicely. You will find them swimming in the waters of Lake Tusi Mek'ta, but you'll need to be handy with a spear.

As they say, <If(PlayerParameter(4))>Mistress<Else/>Master</If> <Split(<Highlight>ObjectParameter(1)</Highlight>, ,1)/>, one can't work on an empty stomach─much less when one isn't down in the caverns. So please, bring me the ingredient.
In order to proceed with this quest, you must first complete the quest “A New Fishing Ex-spear-ience” and unlock spearfishing.
That's three scorpions I require, good <If(PlayerParameter(4))>madam<Else/>sir</If>. You will find them if you search in the Husk.
That's three handfuls of wild berries I require, good <If(PlayerParameter(4))>madam<Else/>sir</If>. You will find them growing in the Husk.
That's a piranha I require, good <If(PlayerParameter(4))>madam<Else/>sir</If>. You will find them swimming in the waters of Lake Tusi Mek'ta.
Welcome back, <If(PlayerParameter(4))>Mistress<Else/>Master</If> <Split(<Highlight>ObjectParameter(1)</Highlight>, ,1)/>. Did your procurement efforts meet with success?
Oho, such lively scorpions these are! And this one almost stung me, the cheeky fellow! But it won't be stinging anyone after I've fried it up to a crisp, oh no.
Oho, such plump, juicy berries these are! I shall press them to make invigorating drinks for our workers in the event they can't readily find groundwater.
Oho, such a lively piranha this is! And it almost took a bite out of me, the cheeky fellow! But it won't be biting anyone after I've cleaned out its guts and hung it up to dry, oh no.
With that, I shall set about the preparations at once. My thanks for your kind assistance, good <If(PlayerParameter(4))>madam<Else/>sir</If>!
